parser3.js

module.exports = function(hljs) {
  return {
    subLanguage: 'xml',
    contains: [
      {
        className: 'comment',
        begin: '^#', end: '$'
      },
      {
        className: 'comment',
        begin: '\\^rem{', end: '}',
        relevance: 10,
        contains: [
          {
            begin: '{', end: '}',
            contains: ['self']
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        className: 'preprocessor',
        begin: '^@(?:BASE|USE|CLASS|OPTIONS)$',
        relevance: 10
      },
      {
        className: 'title',
        begin: '@[\\w\\-]+\\[[\\w^;\\-]*\\](?:\\[[\\w^;\\-]*\\])?(?:.*)$'
      },
      {
        className: 'variable',
        begin: '\\$\\{?[\\w\\-\\.\\:]+\\}?'
      },
      {
        className: 'keyword',
        begin: '\\^[\\w\\-\\.\\:]+'
      },
      {
        className: 'number',
        begin: '\\^#[0-9a-fA-F]+'
      },
      hljs.C_NUMBER_MODE
    ]
  };
};
